modName: Wizard Hats Retexture for Blanket Scarf - Earth Tones
summary: A rustic retexture for Wizard Hats by sirwho, made to match Blanket Scarf Retexture Earth Tones Edition by Jasper.
descriptionHtml:
This mod was made for Wizard Hats by sirwho at Skyrim Nexus.
It Retextures the Brown, Green, Grey, Red, White and Yellow hats to match some of the rustic 
textures of Blanket Scarf Retexture Earth Tones Edition by Jasper, and the two mods are meant to be 
used together. 
It's a pretty crude retexture so don't expect the names to describe the colors they're matching up with properly. lol
I avoided tampering with the Beige, Black and Blue variants because they're made to go with
commonly worn mage npc sets. 
The other hats are only assigned to Court Wizards, and can be removed from them with this method: 
" Simply go into TES5Edit. Expand the esp and go to the "Outfits" section. It will list the court wizards outfits with their names in them. Right click on them and select "Remove".
Close TES5Edit, make sure in the pop up screen the esp is selected and only the esp. Un-tick "back-up Plugins".
Done. This eliminates the court wizard outfits while keeping the rest of the mod intact. " 
- rentak
Credits: 
Jasper on Skyrim Nexus for providing the wonderful textures, and retexture for the Blanket Scarf that inspired this.
Sirwho on Skyrim Nexus for making the wizard hats. 


Heres a guide of which Wizard Hat matches which Blanket Scarf:
Wizard Hat Brown - BlanketScarf 1
Wizard Hat Green - BlanketScarf 7
Wizard Hat Grey - BlanketScarf 16
Wizard Hat Red - BlanketScarf 2
Wizard Hat White - BlanketScarf 20
Wizard Hat Yellow - BlanketScarf 5


----------------
Installation: 
Download and install Wizard Hats by sirwho at Skyrim Nexus.
Drag the Data folder into your TESV.exe folder. 

Uninstallation:
Remember where you put the textures and remove 'em lol.
Or re-install the Wizard Hats mod.
author: spoonninja22
